lexUnit.name: mouth.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the opening and cavity in the lower part of the face, surrounded by the lips, through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

sentence.text: She tingled with excitement , soon she would be with him , she would see his dear face , touch his crisp hair , feel his mouth on hers .
I remember that she said , ` And that would have been enough , even without the rest , " as she stooped to put her mouth on mine .
She felt his warm mouth on the palm of her hand then she was being pulled on to his lap .
He was so close , she could n't think , she certainly could n't speak , explain that nothing mattered except the longing , the sudden urgency , the need to feel his mouth on hers .
I smiled politely and scalded my mouth on the tea .
Her mouth was wide and generous , a classic Cupid 's bow which no amount of severe , businesslike flattening would tone down .
His mouth ground down hard , forcing a terrible anger to her heart because he was untrue and yet she still loved and needed him .
Georg 's mouth firmed into a thin , disapproving line .
He fetches half a tree in his dripping mouth and insists on me throwing it for him to fetch .
When the train started Jasper put his mouth over the tip and realized he could n't light the cigarette because the end was outside .
` Shameless , " he teased thickly , lifting his mouth for a moment to gaze darkly down at her rapt face .
His eyelids flickered and he put his sour unshaven mouth to hers .
She turned to him , pressing her mouth to his in a long , drugging kiss , while her hands slid tantalisingly over his hips in a blatant invitation .
He was just shifting this succulent morsel in his mouth before grinding her bones , when he heard an extraordinary sound ; he heard a gurgle of laughter .
But Baccy never used a curse word , nor did he ever take the briar pipe out of his mouth despite having abandoned the tobacco habit on joining the church at the age of eighteen .
Their eyes met , sheer delight in each other in both pairs , and then Luke was kissing her on the mouth with so much loving tenderness that she could n't speak for quite a while .
He tried protesting to Selkirk , who simply struck him across the mouth and pushed him through the metal-studded door .
He pursed his big mouth into such a babyish pout that Meredith found him comical ; he sniggered .
Arty closed his mouth and began to brush the heel of his open hand against his left temple in a repeated gesture of frustration .
He closed his mouth down around hers , and for a moment she was too stunned to react .
Catching sight of herself in a wall mirror , Loretta closed her mouth and waited for Bridget to go on .
The corners of Lucinda 's mouth tilted mischievously .
Werner was in his late forties with a short , stocky physique , thinning brown hair and a neatly trimmed russet moustache that tapered down over the corners of his mouth .
A slow , amused smile lifted the corners of Luke 's mouth .
Fran blushed crimson as she realised that he was staring at her , one corner of his mouth lifted mockingly as though he could read her thoughts .
And as if goaded beyond endurance he tore off his mask , tore off hers , took her face between both hands and forced his mouth on hers .
The porter drew back his hand and rubbed his mouth with the back of his wrist .
She had time to let out one shrill scream before a dirty hand was clamped over her mouth .
It would have been better to wipe your mouth on both sleeves and change your shirt every other day .
He has blood caked round his mouth , a blindfold over his eyes , and his shoulders are hunched .
He had tried to feel inside his mouth to see if any teeth were broken or missing , but the great bulk of his boxing-glove precluded any such investigation .
Threat Number Three sobered Henry up slightly , though his mother and Noreen , flanking him on each side like two prison warders , had n't said a word since Eunice had opened her mouth .
Wild with fear , Constance opened her mouth and bit his nose so hard that it hurt her teeth .
` Ja " , he whispered , as she caressed his corded neck with her open mouth , overwhelmed by the scent and taste of his heated , sweat-dampened skin .
He shut his mouth and hung his head .
He shut his mouth and swallowed hard , and in the space of about two seconds she saw a whole kaleidoscope of emotions flash in succession through his mind .
He could see the longer teeth at the sides of her mouth and the folds of wet black skin that at any moment would draw back in a threatening snarl .
` Zambia has come back to us , " Jahsaxa said , dabbing the side of her mouth with a fingernail .
Paul has worry lines across his forehead and smile lines at the side of his mouth .
We believe a cup of coffee leaves a nicer taste in your mouth when it 's given to you by name .
This time when he kissed me , his mouth stayed on mine , and I opened my lips a little , and so did he , and I could taste him in my mouth .
Her lips parted uncertainly and she tasted the sweet caress of his mouth like a child tasting fizzy sherbet for the first time .
I get head spin , and end up lolling out of the car , dribbling through my nose onto the tarmac just to get the vile bitter taste of nicotine out of my mouth .
He smeared the chicken with edenwort , okra and gravy , rubbed it round the plate and set it off once more in the direction of his wide , beautifully moulded mouth .
Billy 's wide mouth stretched into a grin as he winked back .
He looked at her wide mouth , the full lips that kissed him so often and so lusciously .
` Quite honestly " -- Haverford was wiping his mouth with the napkin still festooned about his neck -- ` neither can I. "
` Strange times , " he said , wiping his mouth with the back of his hand .
He wiped his mouth with the back of his hand .
Katherine 's mouth dropped .
When he saw the devastation , his mouth dropped open .
Caroline 's mouth dropped open .
His mouth was too dry to speak but he could not reach for the water now .
His mouth was dry .
Lucy 's mouth was dry .
Alyssia 's mouth fell open .
Garvey 's mouth fell open and his tongue lolled .
Leith 's mouth fell open in surprise as she realised that this awful man thought she and Travis were sleeping together .
Caroline 's mouth fell open .
Gazzer 's mouth hung open in amazement .
Marek 's mouth hung open .
Oliver 's mouth hung open .
Her bosom heaved , her wet mouth opened , her wide eyes stared .
Sam 's mouth opened , but what it said seemed not to be what it had opened for .
His mouth was open slightly and his chest moved slowly .
Joseph 's mouth set in a thin line .
Nadine 's mouth set in a firm , determined line .
His mouth was tight , his jaw set in anger .
Liu Chang 's mouth opened as if to form a question , then clicked shut .
Gurder 's mouth opened and shut a few times .
The girl 's mouth opened and shut a few times .
Fox 's mouth twisted .
Vanessa 's mouth twisted .
Caroline 's mouth twisted .
His mouth twitches almost imperceptibly .
She came back in , looked at Kath and her mouth twitched .
His mouth twitched at the corner .
Every area is rich in spectacular views and welcoming villages the locals all with tales to tell and a wealth of country cooking to make your mouth water .
Now , as the waiter served them both with salmon poached in white wine , dressed with a spicy sauce and served with salad and new potatoes , she felt her mouth watering in anticipation of the meal .
The fragrant steam made his mouth water .
I 'm n - this is gon na be a word of mouth kind of thing .
No one from his tribe opened his mouth , instead they got more scared and weaker .

I was confined to my room , terrorized by the most horrible threats , cruelly ill-used to break my spirit - see this stab on my shoulder and the bruises from end to end of my arms - and a gag was thrust into my mouth on the one occasion when I tried to call from the window .
